00001 /*
00002     Copyright (C) 2005-2007 Feeling Software Inc.

00005 /*
00006     The idea is simple: the object registers itself in the constructor, with one container.
00007     It may register/unregister itself with other containers subsequently.
00008 
00009     It keeps a list of the containers and a pointer to the main container so that the up-classes
00010     can easily access it. In the destructor, the object unregisters itself with the container(s).
00011 
00012     The object has a RTTI-like static class structure so that the container(s) know which
00013     object type list to remove this object from when it is deleted.
00014 */
00015

00029 typedef fm::pvector<FUObjectTracker> FUObjectTrackerList; 
00043 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FUObject

00072 
00076     inline bool IsType(const FUObjectType& _type) const { return GetObjectType() == _type; }
00077 
00081     inline bool HasType(const FUObjectType& _type) const { return GetObjectType().Includes(_type); }

00086     size_t GetTrackerCount() const { return trackers.size(); }

00113 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FUObjectTracker
00114 {
00115 public:
00117     virtual ~FUObjectTracker() {}
00118 
00122     virtual void OnObjectReleased(FUObject* object) = 0;
00123 
00126     virtual bool TracksObject(const FUObject* object) const { return object != NULL ? object->HasTracker(this) : false; }
00127 
00128 protected:
00131     void TrackObject(FUObject* object) { if(object) object->AddTracker(this); }
00132 
00135     void UntrackObject(FUObject* object) { if(object) object->RemoveTracker(this); }
00136 };

00144 template <class ObjectClass = FUObject>
00145 class FUObjectPtr : public FUObjectTracker
00146 {
00147 protected:
00149     ObjectClass* ptr;
00150 
00151 public:
00155     FUObjectPtr(ObjectClass* _ptr = NULL) : ptr(_ptr)
00156     {
00157         if (ptr != NULL) FUObjectTracker::TrackObject((FUObject*) ptr);
00158         ptr = ptr;
00159     }
00160 
00163     ~FUObjectPtr()
00164     {
00165         if (ptr != NULL) FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject((FUObject*) ptr);
00166         ptr = NULL;
00167     }
00168 
00172     FUObjectPtr& operator=(ObjectClass* _ptr)
00173     {
00174         if (ptr != NULL) FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject((FUObject*) ptr);
00175         ptr = _ptr;
00176         if (ptr != NULL) FUObjectTracker::TrackObject((FUObject*) ptr);
00177         return *this;
00178     }
00179     inline FUObjectPtr& operator=(const FUObjectPtr& _ptr) { return operator=(_ptr.ptr); } 
00183     virtual bool TracksObject(const FUObject* object) const { return (FUObject*) ptr == object; }
00184 
00187     inline ObjectClass& operator*() { FUAssert(ptr != NULL, return *ptr); return *ptr; }
00188     inline const ObjectClass& operator*() const { FUAssert(ptr != NULL, return *ptr); return *ptr; } 
00189     inline ObjectClass* operator->() { return ptr; } 
00190     inline const ObjectClass* operator->() const { return ptr; } 
00191     inline operator ObjectClass*() { return ptr; } 
00192     inline operator const ObjectClass*() const { return ptr; } 
00194 protected:
00198     virtual void OnObjectReleased(FUObject* object)
00199     {
00200         FUAssert(TracksObject(object), return);
00201         ptr = NULL;
00202     }
00203 };

00216 template <class ObjectClass = FUObject>
00217 class FUObjectRef : public FUObjectPtr<ObjectClass>
00218 {
00219 private:
00220     typedef FUObjectPtr<ObjectClass> Parent;
00221 
00222 public:
00226     FUObjectRef(ObjectClass* _ptr = NULL)
00227     :   FUObjectPtr<ObjectClass>(_ptr)
00228     {
00229     }
00230 
00233     ~FUObjectRef()
00234     {
00235         FUObject* _ptr = (FUObject*) Parent::operator->();
00236         SAFE_RELEASE(_ptr);
00237     }
00238 
00243     FUObjectRef& operator=(ObjectClass* __ptr)
00244     {
00245         FUObject* _ptr = (FUObject*) Parent::operator->();
00246         SAFE_RELEASE( _ptr);
00247         Parent::operator=(__ptr);
00248         return *this;
00249     }
00250     inline FUObjectRef& operator=(FUObjectPtr<ObjectClass>& _ptr) { return operator=(_ptr.ptr); } 
00251     inline FUObjectRef& operator=(FUObjectRef& _ptr) { return operator=(_ptr.ptr); } 
00252 };

00261 template <class ObjectClass = FUObject>
00262 class FUObjectList : public fm::pvector<ObjectClass>, FUObjectTracker
00263 {
00264 public:
00265     typedef fm::pvector<ObjectClass> Parent;
00266     typedef ObjectClass* item;
00267     typedef const ObjectClass* const_item;
00268     typedef item* iterator;
00269     typedef const_item* const_iterator;
00270 
00272     virtual ~FUObjectList() { clear(); }
00273 
00275     void clear()
00276     {
00277         for (iterator it = begin(); it != end(); ++it)
00278         {
00279             FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject((FUObject*) (*it));
00280         }
00281         Parent::clear();
00282     }
00283     
00286     ObjectClass*& front() { return (ObjectClass*&) Parent::front(); }
00287     const ObjectClass*& front() const { return (const ObjectClass*&) Parent::front(); } 
00291     ObjectClass*& back() { return (ObjectClass*&) Parent::back(); }
00292     const ObjectClass*& back() const { return (const ObjectClass*&) Parent::back(); } 
00297     inline ObjectClass* at(size_t index) { return (ObjectClass*) Parent::at(index); }
00298     inline const ObjectClass* at(size_t index) const { return (ObjectClass*) Parent::at(index); } 
00299     template <class INTEGER> inline ObjectClass* operator[](INTEGER index) { return at(index); } 
00300     template <class INTEGER> inline const ObjectClass* operator[](INTEGER index) const { return at(index); } 
00304     inline iterator begin() { return (!Parent::empty()) ? &front() : NULL; }
00305     inline const_iterator begin() const { return (!Parent::empty()) ? &front() : NULL; } 
00309     inline iterator end() { return (!Parent::empty()) ? (&back()) + 1 : NULL; }
00310     inline const_iterator end() const { return (!Parent::empty()) ? (&back()) + 1 : NULL; } 
00316     inline iterator find(const ObjectClass* item) { iterator f = Parent::find(item); return begin() + (f - begin()); }
00317     inline const_iterator find(const ObjectClass* item) const { const_iterator f = Parent::find(item); return begin() + (f - begin()); }
00318 
00321     inline void push_back(ObjectClass* object)
00322     {
00323         FUObjectTracker::TrackObject((FUObject*)object);
00324         Parent::push_back(object);
00325     }
00326 
00331     inline iterator insert(iterator _iterator, ObjectClass* object)
00332     {
00333         FUObjectTracker::TrackObject(object);
00334         iterator originalStart = begin();
00335         iterator newIt = Parent::insert(Parent::begin() + (_iterator - originalStart), object);
00336         return begin() + (newIt - Parent::begin());
00337     }
00338 
00344     template <class _It>
00345     inline void insert(iterator _where, _It _startIterator, _It _endIterator)
00346     {
00347         size_t relativeWhere = _where - begin();
00348         size_t count = _endIterator - _startIterator;
00349         Parent::insert(Parent::begin() + relativeWhere, count);
00350         _where = begin() + relativeWhere;
00351 
00352         for (; _startIterator != _endIterator; ++_startIterator, ++_where)
00353         {
00354             *_where = const_cast<ObjectClass*>((const ObjectClass*)(*_startIterator));
00355             FUObjectTracker::TrackObject(const_cast<FUObject*>((const FUObject*) (*_startIterator)));
00356         }
00357     }
00358 
00360     inline void pop_back()
00361     {
00362         if (!Parent::empty())
00363         {
00364             FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject(back());
00365             Parent::pop_back();
00366         }
00367     }
00368     
00371     inline iterator erase(iterator _it)
00372     {
00373         FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject((FUObject*) *_it);
00374         iterator it = Parent::begin() + (_it - begin());
00375         it = Parent::erase(it);
00376         return begin() + (it - Parent::begin());
00377     }
00378 
00381     inline void erase(iterator first, iterator last)
00382     {
00383         for (iterator it = first; it != last; ++it) FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject((FUObject*) *it);
00384         Parent::erase(first, last);
00385     }
00386 
00390     inline bool erase(const ObjectClass* value)
00391     {
00392         iterator it = Parent::find(value);
00393         if (it != Parent::end())
00394         {
00395             FUObjectTracker::UntrackObject((FUObject*) *it);
00396             Parent::erase(it);
00397             return true;
00398         }
00399         return false;
00400     }
00401 
00404     inline void erase(size_t index) { erase(begin() + index); }
00405 
00411     inline bool release(const ObjectClass* value)
00412     {
00413         iterator it = Parent::find(value);
00414         if (it != Parent::end()) { Parent::erase(it); ((FUObject*) value)->Release(); return true; }
00415         return false;
00416     }
00417 
00420     virtual bool TracksObject(const FUObject* object) const { return Parent::contains((ObjectClass*) object); }
00421 
00423     FUObjectList<ObjectClass>& operator= (const FUObjectList<ObjectClass>& other) { clear(); insert(end(), other.begin(), other.end()); return *this; }
00424 
00425 protected:
00428     virtual void OnObjectReleased(FUObject* object)
00429     {
00430         FUAssert(TracksObject(object), return);
00431         Parent::erase((ObjectClass*) object);
00432     }
00433 };

00441 template <typename ObjectClass = FUObject>
00442 class FUObjectContainer : public FUObjectList<ObjectClass>
00443 {
00444 private:
00445     typedef FUObjectList<ObjectClass> Parent;
00446     
00447 public:
00450     virtual ~FUObjectContainer() { clear(); }
00451 
00453     void clear()
00454     {
00455 #ifdef _DEBUG
00456         size_t arraySize=size();
00457 #endif
00458         while (size() > 0)
00459         {
00460             ((FUObject*) Parent::back())->Release();
00461 #ifdef _DEBUG
00462             if(size() >= arraySize)
00463                 FUFail(return); //if you crash here, you're probably deleting something you shouldn't be, or not cloning correctly an object.
00464             arraySize = size();
00465 #endif
00466         }
00467     }
00468     
00471     size_t size() const { return Parent::size(); }
00472     
00475     ObjectClass* Add()
00476     {
00477         ObjectClass* object = new ObjectClass();
00478         push_back(object);
00479         return object;
00480     }
00481 
00485     template <class A1>
00486     ObjectClass* Add(const A1& arg1)
00487     {
00488         ObjectClass* object = new ObjectClass(arg1);
00489         push_back(object);
00490         return object;
00491     }
00492 
00497     template <class A1, class A2>
00498     ObjectClass* Add(const A1& arg1, const A2& arg2)
00499     {
00500         ObjectClass* object = new ObjectClass(arg1, arg2);
00501         push_back(object);
00502         return object;
00503     }
00504 
00510     template <class A1, class A2, class A3>
00511     ObjectClass* Add(const A1& arg1, const A2& arg2, const A3& arg3)
00512     {
00513         ObjectClass* object = new ObjectClass(arg1, arg2, arg3);
00514         push_back(object);
00515         return object;
00516     }
00517 };

00523 template <class HigherClassType>
00524 inline HigherClassType* DynamicCast(FUObject* object) { return object->HasType(HigherClassType::GetClassType()) ? (HigherClassType*) object : NULL; }
